p: According to SBTi, corporate net-zero emissions satisfy two criteria: “Reducing scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions to zero or to a residual level that is consistent with reaching net-zero emissions at the global or sector level in eligible 1.5 °C-aligned pathways” and “neutralizing any residual emissions at the net-zero target year and any GHG emissions released into the atmosphere thereafter” [42].
